description: A calculated attribute definition for Customer Profiles. Source:- https://github.com/aws-cloudformation/aws-cloudformation-resource-providers-customer-profiles

DomainName.description: The unique name of the domain.
DomainName.title: AWSCustomerProfilesCalculatedAttributeDefinitionDomainNameDefinition

CalculatedAttributeName.description: The unique name of the calculated attribute.
CalculatedAttributeName.title: AWSCustomerProfilesCalculatedAttributeDefinitionCalculatedAttributeNameDefinition

DisplayName.description: The display name of the calculated attribute.
DisplayName.title: AWSCustomerProfilesCalculatedAttributeDefinitionDisplayNameDefinition

Description.description: The description of the calculated attribute.
Description.title: AWSCustomerProfilesCalculatedAttributeDefinitionDescriptionDefinition

AttributeName.description: The name of an attribute defined in a profile object type.
AttributeName.title: AWSCustomerProfilesCalculatedAttributeDefinitionAttributeNameDefinition

AttributeItem.description: The details of a single attribute item specified in the mathematical expression.
AttributeItem.title: AWSCustomerProfilesCalculatedAttributeDefinitionAttributeItemDefinition

AttributeList.description: A list of attribute items specified in the mathematical expression.
AttributeList.title: AWSCustomerProfilesCalculatedAttributeDefinitionAttributeListDefinition

Expression.description: Mathematical expression that is performed on attribute items provided in the attribute list. Each element in the expression should follow the structure of "{ObjectTypeName.AttributeName}".
Expression.title: AWSCustomerProfilesCalculatedAttributeDefinitionExpressionDefinition

AttributeDetails.description: Mathematical expression and a list of attribute items specified in that expression.
AttributeDetails.title: AWSCustomerProfilesCalculatedAttributeDefinitionAttributeDetailsDefinition

RangeValue.description: The amount of time of the specified unit.
RangeValue.title: AWSCustomerProfilesCalculatedAttributeDefinitionRangeValueDefinition

Range.description: The relative time period over which data is included in the aggregation.
Range.title: AWSCustomerProfilesCalculatedAttributeDefinitionRangeDefinition

ObjectCount.description: The number of profile objects used for the calculated attribute.
ObjectCount.title: AWSCustomerProfilesCalculatedAttributeDefinitionObjectCountDefinition

Threshold.description: The threshold for the calculated attribute.
Threshold.title: AWSCustomerProfilesCalculatedAttributeDefinitionThresholdDefinition

Conditions.description: The conditions including range, object count, and threshold for the calculated attribute.
Conditions.title: AWSCustomerProfilesCalculatedAttributeDefinitionConditionsDefinition

Statistic.description: The aggregation operation to perform for the calculated attribute.
Statistic.title: AWSCustomerProfilesCalculatedAttributeDefinitionStatisticDefinition

Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

Key.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

Value.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

Tag.title: AWSCustomerProfilesCalculatedAttributeDefinitionTagDefinition

Tags.description: An array of key-value pairs to apply to this resource.
Tags.title: AWSCustomerProfilesCalculatedAttributeDefinitionTagsDefinition
